duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the operations of the critical care department, ensuring high-quality patient care and adherence to regulations and protocols.
Manage and lead a team of healthcare professionals, providing support, guidance, and resources for their professional development and success.
Collaborate with the CNO and other stakeholders to develop and implement strategies for employee engagement, staffing, and departmental success in service, people, quality, growth, and finance.
Ensure effective communication and coordination between different critical care units, promoting a culture of collaboration and teamwork.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (Master's in Nursing or Healthcare Administration preferred)
